column16:
Use #T8_ak
to share tech about this character on Twitter

column2:
Flame infused moves are enhanced.
Poison Mist f,n,d,DF+1+2 has faster startup.
Certain throws gain homing property.
column7:
Long range attack that is useful for block and whiff punish 
 situations. Risky to throw it out otherwise as the second hit 
 can be crouched under and punished.

Safe mid heat engager you can use for approaching. 
 It has very poor tracking.

column12: f,n,d,df+1 ⏵ f+3,2~DF ⏵ BST 1 ⏵ f+3,2~DF ⏵ BST 1 ⏵ db+2,3

column7:
Unsafe heat engager you can use for punishment and as 
 a guaranteed follow-up after certain moves.

Unsafe heat engager from BAD stance. Useful as 
 a guaranteed follow-up after certain moves.

Useful as a follow-up after BAD 1+2 or even as a punish 
 against moves that recover crouching.
Single jab to check situations. It has useful extensions.

Mid poke to check situations. Use the df+1,2 extension 
 sparringly to check opponents that like to retaliate your df+1.

Unsafe mid counterhit launcher. Good button for calling out 
 opponents overextending on their pressure. 
 For a safer counterhit fishing launcher, use df+3.

Low pokes to harass the opponent. Both lows lead to really 
 good frame advantage on counterhit. 
 sidestep 2 into ws+2 works as a simple frame trap.

column12: f,n,d,df+1 ⏵ f+3,2~DF ⏵ BST 1 ⏵ f+3,2~DF ⏵ BST 1 ⏵ db+2,3

column7:
A long range counterhit launcher that creates space when 
 blocked. Good button to control space and create spacing 
 traps.

High crushing low with counterhit properties. It can shift to 
 BAD stance by holding forward. Good way to approach and 
 apply stance mixups.

column2:
CH db+4
CH (4),3
CH (d+3+4),1
CH BAD 4

column7:
As a grappler, incorporating his grabs is very important 
 start with simple ones such as f,f,f+2+4 and f,hcf+1 and then 
 learn his chain throws and possible routes.

column2:
f,n,d,df+1
heat on ws+3,1~F
heat on BAD 1,2~F

column6:
Dark Upper speed depends on player's execution
It can punish -13 moves, but is more practical against -15 attacks

column12:
After f+1+2~F, you can cancel the stance into Heat Burst
to extend the combo.
After tornado, use db+2,3 for mid distance and df+3 for close one.
air f,f,f+2+4 can be used to break floors, and f+1+4 to break walls.
